statements: SELECT * FROM donations
SELECT donor_id, donation_date FROM donations
SELECT donor_id, amount FROM donations WHERE amount > 100
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE donation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM donations ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT donor_id, donation_date, amount FROM donations WHERE donor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT donor_id, amount FROM donations ORDER BY amount DESC, donor_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE donation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT donor_id, SUM(amount) AS total_donation FROM donations GROUP BY donor_id HAVING total_donation > 5000;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations;
SELECT donor_name, donation_date, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM donation_categories WHERE category_id = 3;
SELECT donor_name, donor_email FROM donors WHERE donor_phone LIKE '%123%';
SELECT donor_name, donor_email, donor_address FROM donors ORDER BY donor_name DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;

SELECT donors.donor_name, donations.donation_amount, donation_categories.category_name FROM donors JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id JOIN donation_categories ON donations.donor_id = donation_categories.category_id;
SELECT donor_name, donor_email, donor_phone FROM donors WHERE donor_address LIKE '%Avenue%';
SELECT donor_id, donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donations ORDER BY donation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Donors;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM Donors WHERE donation_amount > 1000;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM Donors ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM Donors INNER JOIN Donations ON Donors.donor_id = Donations.donor_id;
SELECT Donors.donor_name, Donations.donation_date FROM Donors JOIN Donations ON Donors.donor_id = Donations.donor_id WHERE Donations.donation_type = 'Online';
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM Donors ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_type FROM Donors INNER JOIN Donations ON Donors.donor_id = Donations.donor_id;
SELECT * FROM Donors WHERE donation_amount > 5000;
SELECT Donors.donor_name, Donations.donation_date FROM Donors LEFT JOIN Donations ON Donors.donor_id = Donations.donor_id;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, category_name FROM Donors INNER JOIN DonorCategories ON Donors.donor_id = DonorCategories.category_id;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donors
SELECT donation_amount, donation_date FROM donations
SELECT donor_id, donor_name, donation_date FROM donors
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 100
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donors WHERE donation_amount < 50
SELECT * FROM donors WHERE donation_amount > 1000 ORDER BY donor_name DESC
SELECT donor_id, donor_name FROM donors JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id WHERE donation_amount >= 5000 ORDER BY donor_name, donation_amount DESC

SELECT donor_name, SUM(donation_amount) AS total_donation FROM donors JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id GROUP BY donor_name HAVING total_donation > 20000 ORDER BY total_donation DESC
SELECT donor_name, donation_date FROM donors ORDER BY donation_date ASC LIMIT 5

SELECT donors.donor_name, donation_categories.category_name FROM donors JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id JOIN donation_mapping ON donations.donation_id = donation_mapping.donation_id JOIN donation_categories ON donation_mapping.category_id = donation_categories.category_id WHERE donation_categories.category_name = 'Education'
SELECT * FROM donors;
SELECT donor_id, donor_name FROM donors ORDER BY donor_name DESC;
SELECT donation_id, donation_date, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donors JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id;
SELECT d.donor_name, dc.category_name FROM donors d JOIN donor_donation_category ddc ON d.donor_id = ddc.donor_id JOIN donation_categories dc ON ddc.category_id = dc.category_id;
SELECT * FROM donors;
SELECT donor_id, donor_name FROM donors WHERE donation_amount > 1000;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donors ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;

SELECT donors.donor_name, donations.donation_date, donation_categories.category_name FROM donors JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id JOIN donor_donation_category ON donors.donor_id = donor_donation_category.donor_id JOIN donation_categories ON donor_donation_category.category_id = donation_categories.category_id;

SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, total_donation, donation_count FROM donors JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id JOIN donation_stats ON donations.donation_id = donation_stats.donation_id WHERE total_donation > donation_amount;
